text: @RandPaul @TimRunsHisMouth @NYGovCuomo GFY You walked around unmasked, went to the gym while awaiting results of your COVID19 test. You don't get to say shit about anything. It's quite clear why your neighbor beat you up. You're an asshole. Absolutely childish behavior from someone in your position. Grow up or GTFO
